passives.name: Energized
passives.effects: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.

passives.name: Polarity
passives.effects: Your {{tip|Energized}} attacks against targets not hit by your previous ''Energized'' attack do not consume any ''Energize'' stacks on-hit.

passives.name: Dynamo
passives.effects: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} [[on-hit]] equal to {{as|13% of the target's '''current''' health}}.
